nodes.text: Star Wars Action Toy Book was a series of small children's books produced in 1997 by White Heat, Ltd. and published by Fun Works. The stiff, cardboard books featured cutout pages through which an action figure hung from a cord was displayed. This caused the figure, central to the story, to be prominently displayed in the book when the pages were opened. The two Star Wars Action Toy Books were written by Jane Paley and illustrated by Ken Steacy.
